abstract: Senior Obama administration official says Ron Dermer, Israeli ambassador to United States who helped set up Prime Min Benjamin Netanyahu's upcoming address to Congress, has continually put political fortunes of the prime minister above Israeli-US relations; Netanyahu's visit is another deterioration in relationship between Pres Obama and Republicans.
lead_paragraph: A senior official said the Israeli envoy, who orchestrated a visit in which Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will address Congress, had repeatedly put politics above diplomacy.

byline.contributor: Jodi Rudoren contributed reporting from Jerusalem.

snippet: A senior official said the Israeli envoy, who orchestrated a visit in which Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu will address Congress, had repeatedly put politics above diplomacy.

headline.main: Administration Official Criticizes Israeli Ambassador Over Netanyahu Visit
headline.print_headline: White House’s Dismay Over Netanyahu Visit Extends to Ambassador
